x10.matrix.dist.summa

Class SummaSparse

  • x10.lang.Object
    • x10.matrix.dist.summa.SummaSparse

  • public class SummaSparse
extends x10.lang.Object
    This is SUMMA implementation in X10 for distributed sparse matrix.
    See Also:
    SummaDense

      • mult

        public static void mult(x10.lang.Int ps,
        x10.lang.Double beta,
        DistSparseMatrix A,
        DistSparseMatrix B,
        DistDenseMatrix C)
        Perform SUMMA distributed dense matrix multiply: C = A * B + beta * C.
        Parameters:
        ps - panel size
        beta - scaling factor for output matrix
        A - first input distributed sparse matrix in multiplication
        B - second input distributed sparse matrix in multiplication
        C - the input/result distributed dense matrix
        See Also:
        parallelMult(wk1, wk2), SummaDense.parallelMult(wk1, wk2)

      • multTrans

        public static void multTrans(x10.lang.Int ps,
             x10.lang.Double beta,
             DistSparseMatrix A,
             DistSparseMatrix B,
             DistDenseMatrix C)
        Perform SUMMA distributed dense matrix multiply: C = A * BT + beta * C
        Parameters:
        ps - panel size
        beta - scaling factor for output matrix
        A - first input distributed sparse matrix in multiplication
        B - second input distributed sparse matrix which is used in tranposed form
        C - the input/result distributed dense matrix
